ai-patthana14.31:0.2_0: The Order of the Dhamma ladies that are difficult for the living, etc.,
ai-patthana14.31:2.1_0: Kindness arises dependent on the teaching ...
ai-patthana14.31:5.1_0: One does not construct the Dhamma for the sake of happiness, nor for the sake of coolness.
ai-patthana14.31:8.1_0: One does not construct the teaching, having achieved the pleasant state, causes the reason for it.
ai-patthana14.31:11.1_0: it doesn’t cause on the teaching for the training to shine on the pair of equanimity. Experiential causes and reasons.
